Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a video and a message posted on social media, without any additional evidence or verification.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the video, as it is found to be from a different incident in Chittoor district of Andhra Pradesh, unrelated to the Hyderabad rape and murder case.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the person seen in the video is not one of the accused in the Hyderabad rape and murder case.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times as it relies on misinformation and incorrect interpretation of the video.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the situation by using strong language and emotional appeals.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the person seen in the video is one of the accused in the Hyderabad rape and murder case, without any evidence to support this assumption.
